snippet.title: Iridescence - Gameplay Trailer [Shmup, 2018]
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/792190/Iridescence/
Follow On Twitter: https://twitter.com/killthearcade

Iridescence is a Shoot-Em-Up game with a color-changing mechanic, where you dodge and absorb many different colored bullets.
It features a hand-painted watercolor theme throughout.

-5 main levels and 30 challenge levels.
-Unique watercolor aesthetic
-Compelling puzzle-like score system
-Every enemy placed with purpose
-Dodge & absorb 4 different bullet types
-Tough, dynamic boss fights

COMING TO STEAM DECEMBER 7th 2018 for $5.99

Playable Demo: https://polaritybear.itch.io/iridescence
